Introduction
This topic contains information on the discontinuance of benefits when a child is no longer permanently incapable of self-support, including
protection of disability ratings under 38 U.S.C. 110
considering qualification under school attendance provisions
, and
procedure for reducing or discontinuing benefits
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section B - A Childâ€™s Permanent Incapacity for Self-Support
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section B
